vehicles.description: A white sedan is located directly in the path of our vehicle, situated in the same lane and traveling in the same direction ahead of our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: Since this vehicle was directly in the path of my vehicle, it determined the following distance and speed my vehicle should maintain.

vehicles.description: There is a red truck in the lane to the left ahead, traveling in the opposite direction to our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: A large, slow-moving vehicle may affect the flow of traffic and could require reducing speed or changing lanes in our vehicle.

vehicles.description: A white van is parked on the right side of the road.
vehicles.explanation: Stationary vehicles will not immediately affect the driving route of this vehicle, but attention should be paid to potential unexpected movements or pedestrians that may appear around them.

vehicles.description: The white SUV on the opposite lane is traveling in the opposite direction to our car.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle must be aware of oncoming traffic, such as this SUV, to ensure safe navigation of the road, especially when considering overtaking.

barriers.description: Cement barriers separate the lanes, with a gap on the left side.
barriers.explanation: Vehicles must stay in their lane and exercise caution when approaching gaps in the median strip to prevent accidents or encountering vehicles emerging from side roads.

other objects.description: There is a concrete drainage ditch or slope on the right side of the road.
other objects.explanation: It is important to maintain a safe distance from the roadside to prevent vehicles from accidentally leaving the road.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there is a white sedan directly ahead in the same lane as our vehicle, traveling in the same direction. The presence of this vehicle dictates the following distance and speed that our vehicle must maintain for safety. There is also a red truck to the left in the adjacent lane, moving in the opposite direction, which could affect the flow of traffic around our vehicle, potentially necessitating a reduction in speed or a lane change. On the right side of the road, a white van is parked. While it is not an immediate concern for the driving route, it is essential to remain vigilant for unexpected movements or pedestrians that may emerge around the stationary vehicle. Additionally, a white SUV is observed on the opposite lane traveling in the opposite direction, and our vehicle must be cautious of oncoming traffic when considering overtaking maneuvers.

Cement barriers are noted to separate the lanes, with an opening on the left-hand side. Vehicles need to stay within their lanes and be cautious near these gaps to avoid accidents or mishaps with vehicles that could enter from side roads.

Lastly, there is a concrete drainage ditch or slope on the right side of the road. It is critical for our vehicle to keep a safe distance from the roadside to prevent any risk of accidentally veering off the road. No pedestrians, cyclists, motorcyclists, traffic signs, traffic lights, or traffic cones are present in this image.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe distance from the red truck ahead, be aware of the white sedan on the left side, and be ready to adjust speed or position when necessary. Be cautious of potential risks from the parked white pickup truck, carefully navigate around road debris, and check the surrounding traffic conditions to ensure safety when changing lanes. Additionally, be mindful of the presence of concrete barriers.

1.description and explanation: A stone or object on the road surface. It may pose a hazard to vehicles as it could potentially damage tires or cause drivers to swerve to avoid it. The ego car should maintain a safe distance from the stone, potentially adjusting the lane position if safe to do so, or slowing down to pass it safely.
